etl.description: Course History Export for Major Clarity
etl.query:
select sec.SchoolID, sec.Course_Number, stu.Student_Number, gra.Grade, gra.Grade_Level, to_char(to_number(substr(trm.YearID, 0,2)) + 1990) as gradeyear, gra.EarnedCrHrs, trm.Abbreviation from Students stu join StoredGrades gra on stu.dcid = gra.StudentID join Sections sec on gra.SectionID = sec.id join Terms trm on gra.TermID = trm.ID where stu.Enroll_Status = 0 AND gra.grade_level between 6 and 12 AND gra.storecode IN ('F1','Y1','S1','S2') group by sec.SchoolID, sec.Course_Number, stu.Student_Number, gra.Grade, gra.Grade_Level, to_char(to_number(substr(trm.YearID, 0,2)) + 1990), gra.EarnedCrHrs, trm.Abbreviation;
$schoolid,$course_number,$student_number,$grade,$grade_level,$gradeyear,$abbreviation,$EarnedCrHrs
